T02D2149:243b-1: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ma
T02D2149:243b-2: h'a ya ksha ka lpam n'a ma dh'a ra ni
T02D2149:243b-3: s'a dha na aa mri ta bi ndu /
T02D2149:243b-5: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo lag na rdo
T02D2149:243b-6: rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs
T02D2149:243b-7: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba //
T02D2149:243b-8: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2149:243b-9: sems can rnams ni sa bon gnas dang rtsol rkyen gyis //
T02D2149:243b-10: gdug pas zin gyur dug dang khrag ni 'dras gyur pa //
T02D2149:243b-11: thabs gzhan du mas dbye zhing bsal bar mi nus te /
T02D2149:243b-12: 'dab bzang rgyal pos chu dang 'o ma 'byed pa ltar //
T02D2149:243b-13: gdul bya gdul phyir dbang bskur ji srid mnyes gyur pas //
T02D2149:243b-14: des ni 'byed cing gsal bar phod pa yin pa ste //
T02D2149:243b-15: rgya mtshor zhabs nub 'jig dus me dpung nang 'dug pa //
T02D2149:243b-16: gdug pa'i dgrar gyur ljags 'dril dbugs tsha mi shigs 'dzin //
T02D2149:243b-17: de la btud de ji srid mnyes byas man ngag bri //
T02D2149:243b-18: rang nyams myong bas dug zin sgrub pa rjes dran zung //
T02D2149:243b-21: stag la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ri bo'am /
T02D2149:243b-22: yid du 'ong ba 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su
T02D2149:243b-23: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos khrus nye
T02D2149:243b-24: bar byas te / stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
T02D2149:243b-25: rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um bsams te /
T02D2149:243b-26: de'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i gangg'a'i
T02D2149:243b-27: klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams dang
T02D2149:243b-28: / bla ma dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
T02D2149:243b-29: bskul nas mchod pa rnam lngas yang dag par mchod
T02D2149:243b-30: / de / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2149:243b-31: de'i rjes la byams pa dang /
T02D2149:243b-34: btang snyoms zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la 'dris par bya'o //
T02D2149:243b-35: de nas gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i blos
T02D2149:243b-36: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad stong zhing bdag
T02D2149:243b-38: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva
T02D2149:243b-39: bh'a ba a'atma konyham zhes bya bas mi g-yo bar
T02D2149:243b-40: bya'o // de nas pam las padma'i lte ba la /
T02D2149:243b-41: aa las zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang po gnyis kyi steng du bsams te /
T02D2149:244a-0: yi ge h'um ring po'i sgra dang bcas pa 'od 'phros pa las khro @244a * //
T02D2149:244a-1: bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsams te /
T02D2149:244a-2: de'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu gangg'a'i klung gi bye
T02D2149:244a-3: ma snyed 'bum phrag gi sangs rgyas rnams sbyan drangs
T02D2149:244a-4: la / de'i 'od zer de nyid du thim ste /
T02D2149:244a-5: de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2149:244a-6: sangs rgyas gos sngon po can /
T02D2149:244a-7: zhal gsum phyag drug dang ldan pa /
T02D2149:244a-10: sku mdog mthing nag tu 'dug pa /
T02D2149:244a-11: sbyan gsum me'i phung po 'dra ba /
T02D2149:244a-12: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa ral pa'i cod pan la /
T02D2149:244a-13: sbrul mgo brgyad kyi cod pan yod pa /
T02D2149:244a-14: smin ma dang dpral ba'i mtshams su khro gnyer bsdus pa /
T02D2149:244a-15: ljags 'dril zhing mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2149:244a-16: kha rlangs tsha zhing nga ro'i sgra 'byung ba /
T02D2149:244a-17: de'i dkyil na sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D2149:244a-18: gdug pa zhel mnan nas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa can no //
T02D2149:244a-19: lto ba yangs shing gsus pa'i smad 'khyil pa /
T02D2149:244a-21: g-yon padma r'a ga 'dra ba dbus sku dang mthun pa /
T02D2149:244a-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rgyas pa'o //
T02D2149:244a-23: phyag dang po khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2149:244a-25: bar ma gnyis thal mo brdebs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D2149:244a-26: tha ma gnyis sbrul gdug pa'i rked pa nas bzung zhing mgo nas za ba'o //
T02D2149:244a-27: rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2149:244a-28: gos sngon po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2149:244a-29: sham thabs stag gi ris can bsnams pa'o //
T02D2149:244a-30: lta ba phyin ci log thams cad kyi gzhung 'joms
T02D2149:244a-31: pa'i rtags su nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng na
T02D2149:244a-32: bzhugs pa / tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi steng
T02D2149:244a-33: na rigs bzhi'i klu yis rgyan du byas pa ni
T02D2149:244a-34: dga' bo dang nye dga' 'bar bas snyan cha byas
T02D2149:244a-35: bzhugs pa / pa / lag pa dang dpung pa padma dang chu lhas brgyan pa /
T02D2149:244a-36: stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan khar za ba'i ska
T02D2149:244a-37: rags can nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbul brgyan
T02D2149:244a-38: zhing rgyan du byas pa ni ser po dang dmar
T02D2149:244a-39: po dang dkar po dang nag po ste /
T02D2149:244a-40: rin po che sbyi bo'i steng du na yod pa'o //
T02D2149:244a-41: de ltar bdud la sogs pa rlog par byed pa can du bdag nyid rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2149:244a-42: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D2149:244a-43: rang 'dra'i ye shes sams dpa' sbyan drangs te /
T02D2149:244a-44: snying ga las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2149:244b-0: dza: h'um bam ho: @244b bzhis dgug pa dang /
T02D2149:244b-3: tha mi dad pa'i phyir dbang du bya'o //
T02D2149:244b-4: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gis sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D2149:244b-5: aom dang a'a: dang h'um mthing ga dang /
T02D2149:244b-7: dkar po'i rim pas spyi bo dang /
T02D2149:244b-9: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2149:244b-10: de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas lag na bdud
T02D2149:244b-11: rtsi'i bum pa khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas
T02D2149:244b-13: de nas ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2149:244b-14: skyo bar gyur na sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gis rjes
T02D2149:244b-15: su gnang ba'i gzungs kyi phreng ba kho na bzlas
T02D2149:244b-16: par bya ste / nyung du 'dod pa rnams kyis ni /
T02D2149:244b-17: aom n'e l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni
T02D2149:244b-18: hri da ya ma h'a kro dha s'a dha h'um
T02D2149:244b-19: phat ces snying po'i sngags yi ge nyi shu rtsa
T02D2149:244b-20: gcig pa'o // ngag gi brjod pas kyang skyo bar gyur na /
T02D2149:244b-21: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtor ma nye bar phul te /
T02D2149:244b-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying pos lhag pa dang mtshang ba dag par bya'o //
T02D2149:244b-23: de nas ldang bar 'dod na ye shes sems dpa' phyung ste /
T02D2149:244b-24: yang dag par mchod la aom kri to ba zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2149:244b-25: de nas de'i nga rgyal gyis ldang bar bya'o //
T02D2149:244b-26: bla ma mnyes byas dang ldan snying rjer bcas //
T02D2149:244b-27: brtson 'grus drag ldan dran ldan brtan blo can //
T02D2149:244b-28: skad cig tsam yang gnyid ni log pa min //
T02D2149:244b-29: de bzhin gnyid las rgyal byed shes rab gyis //
T02D2149:244b-30: taksha ka yis zin par gyur pa yang //
T02D2149:244b-31: zla ba drug gis nges par bzung 'gyur zlogs //
T02D2149:244b-32: bla ma la gus brtse bas bdud rtsi thigs pa lhung //
T02D2149:244b-33: bdag gis blangs te mid pas lus rgyas te //
T02D2149:244b-34: lus rgyas stobs kyis sgrub po rjes gzung sgrub thabs dran //
T02D2149:244b-35: bsod nams gang yod sgrub po'i rtog pa'i nad med
T02D2149:244b-36: shog / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag
T02D2149:244b-37: na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi
T02D2149:244b-38: sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2149:244b-39: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i
T02D2149:244b-40: slob dpon dz'a ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D2149:244b-42: / // / bal po'i mkhan po de ba p'u rna ma ti dang /
